lead_paragraph: Golden Eagle Farm, a three-time Eclipse Award-winning thoroughbred breeding operation, plans to liquidate much of its inventory and relocate its San Diego County farmland. The owners Betty Mabee and her son Larry this week announced a six-month timeline to reduce Golden Eagle’s inventory from 282 horses to 25 by mid-2008.
